JANDANACOSTA, 

Being skeptical about something - doubting something is cer=
tain - seems like a reasonable attitude with all the things we encounter in=
 life (politics, tv, religion, car salesmen, diets, advertisements, etc).=
=C2=A0 

So to answer your question "Also, I don't get why anyone who is a =
skeptic would belong to this 
group?".=C2=A0 Doubting and questioning resul=
ts can only make a field of research more=C2=A0 solid in the long run.=C2=
=A0 It helps to divide the weak evidence and methods from the strong. =C2=
=A0 While everyone is still free to pursue their beliefs, everyone only has=
 so much time and money,=C2=A0 and getting help with determining the best a=
reas to spend that time and money can be a valuable thing. 

So for anyone =
doing research, especially their own personal research, who is not wealthy =
and does not have 100 years left in their lives, being skeptical about one'=
s results seems not only a necessity, but I don't think any kind of progres=
s, especially in a difficult area like the paranormal, is even possible wit=
hout it.


--- On Fri, 4/23/10, JANDANACOSTA <jandan108@...> wrote:

=
From: JANDANACOSTA <jandan108@...>

Date: Friday, April 23, 2010, 8:34 PM







=
=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      I am confused about two issues. Fir=
st, Why the angry emails? =C2=A0I don't think I have seen this before with =
this group. Also, I don't get why anyone who is a skeptic would belong to t=
his group.? I mean no disrespect , just curious.

--- On Fri, 4/23/10, Lizz=
ie Broden <yahuli69@yahoo. com> wrote:

. com>

 Friday, April 23, 2010, 8:09 PM















 
=C2=A0



    
      
   =
   
      
You are ever bit as bad=C2=A0as Randi or any of them!=C2=A0 You =
are just the flip-side of the coin!
=C2=A0
Your misuse of the word,=C2=A0"S=
keptic" has taken on a totally new meaning.=C2=A0 You see anyone that has a=
 problem with your half baked ideas, and insanity, yeah I said it, as a "Sk=
eptic."
=C2=A0
Maybe it would do you some good to research the word and ide=
a behind it before you go off half cocked as you are.=C2=A0=C2=A0The world =
is not out to get you or your damned box!=C2=A0 If there is any truth to it=
, the let's see the evidence of it.=C2=A0 Lets look at it for what it is, N=
OT WHAT YOU OR ANYONE WANTS IT TO BE!
=C2=A0
What it is, no more and no les=
s!
=C2=A0
I am a Skeptic, it the true sense of the word.=C2=A0 And I have b=
een holding my tongue hoping you would pull out of this crap.=C2=A0 Frank, =
get a grip!
=C2=A0
Not everyone that disagrees with=C2=A0you is out to get =
you!=C2=A0 I have real problems with the whole theory, but I have never que=
stioned your heart or=C2=A0integrity over it.=C2=A0 (Well, other than letti=
ng Moon play the dance he is playing with YOUR BOX!)
=C2=A0
But, lets analy=
tically look at this for what it is and find=C2=A0the truth of it?=C2=A0 If=
 you want to turn it into a religion that is on top of some mountain, so be=
 it!=C2=A0 But other people are not going to see the subject in black and w=
hite standards.
=C2=A0
Give it a rest and thinks about it.=C2=A0 The world =
is not out to get you Frank!

=C2=A0"Nature is showing us only the tail of =
the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even though, beca=
use of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=
=80=94 Albert Einstein 



"It is far better to grasp the universe as it re=
ally is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and reassuring."
-=
-Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. Don't jus=
t look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL 






From: Frank Sumption <=
purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Fri, April 2=
3, 2010 7:29:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] nuff said?

=C2=A0 


=C2=A0I=C2=
=A0know what it is, even though I can't even spell it or pronounce it. It's=
 what the skeptics and debunkers tout as the answer to all paranormal exper=
ience. I think we ought to pull our claws back in, especially me!
=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0I have gotten "voices" that I thought were perfectly clear, and no on=
e else could hear it, and some=C2=A0I found=C2=A0was just=C2=A0a snippet of=
 music, so yeah, that happens, but it does not eliminate or explain everyth=
ing from the boxes, and other EVP methods, you=C2=A0 just have to be aware =
of the possibility. Anotherr problem is broadcast fragments, sometimes they=
 are just what they sound like, an ad for one thing or another, sometimes t=
hey can=C2=A0have sychronistic meaning, and sometimes they can be altered i=
n some way to form a messages, such as the recent one I had about learning =
sex, which was seemingly ignored by all cuz it has the "s" word--I guess. T=
he fragments can also be distorted as the radio tuning is swept across a st=
ation, I don't accept every word and syllable as meaning something. You hav=
e tio judge mnessage by content and personal meaning. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I have =
seen faces stand up in a carpet right in front of me, not something I just =
happened across, something that happened live as I watched. For someone to =
suggest that's imagination I find very offensive.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0When =
I first switched to a linear sweep in the boxes, I could hear nothing but g=
ibberish, then suddenly=C2=A0I could hear "them"=C2=A0speaking. I doubt tha=
t is all imagination either, I think the mind(which is not brain) has to re=
program the ears, which are brain, to hear.=C2=A0 I also think the skeptics=
 can not allow this programming to take place, hence they can't hear. I wou=
ld be very surprised if any of the hard core skeptics even turned on a box =
for fear that they may hear something that's not there. Rorke(the Phd) impl=
ied as much when he wanted a box to test, or more=C2=A0like debunk. That cr=
ap is frikkin' pathetic!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
F-S
=C2=A0


=C2=A0
On=
 Fri, Apr 23, 2010 at 4:30 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostre=
search. com> wrote:


=C2=A0 



Pareidolia is not psuedo science. It is an=
 actual, proven, natural functioning of the brain.

http://en.wikipedia .or=
g/wiki/ Pareidolia

Please read this article, and more, if you have any que=
stions about it being psuedo science. I chose the Wikipedia version because=
 I thought it would be the least offensive to you. Other articles specifica=
lly called out EVP and other things.

For the record, I don't think all EVP=
's are due to pareidolia. 




On Fri, Apr 23, 2010 at 3:47 PM, Frank Sumpt=
ion <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:


=C2=A0 




=C2=A0It was implied =
that all this stuff is "Pareidolia" , and because you could put a name on i=
t that somehow meant it was all explanined. I've been hearing this pseudo s=
cientific BS for 10 years, so I'm a bit touchy. Science explains the parano=
rmal away, and yet people continune to photograph images, and get their nam=
es, and the names of deseased loved ones through EVP, as well as questions =
answered, and science(althogh not all scientists)=C2=A0just ignores these i=
nconvinient facts and focuses on=C2=A0that we=C2=A0might see things that ar=
e not there, which I disagree with as well. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Did you even both=
er looking at the image on the group home page. That was from sweeping a TV=
 tuner with a random voltage and video recording the monitor screen. So exp=
lain away why there is a wolf image embedded in the guy's hat, an image of =
an alien below his ear, and why in God's name does he resembles the classic=
 description=C2=A0of an MIB or=C2=A0Shadow Person?=C2=A0 Pareidolia no doub=
t!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

n about results and testing with phrases like "Bite Me". I don't see anyone=

I agree trying new things is=
 good.=C2=A0 And discussing results.=C2=A0 And looking for new directions.=

u could be more specific: quote what you have found objectionable, and let =
us know why?
